import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { EpisodesCard } from '../../EpisodesCard/EpisodesCard' import { LocationCard } from '../../LocationCard/LocationCard' import s from './CharacterPage.module.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { requestCharacter } from '../../../redux/main-reducer'; import { Loader } from '../../UI/loader'; const CharacterPage = ({character, requestCharacter, isFetching}) => { const {charId} = useParams() const [allEpisodes, setAllEpisodes] = useState() useEffect(() => { requestCharacter(charId) character.episode.forEach(el => { const id = el.split('/').pop() console.log(id); }) }, []) if(isFetching){ return ( ) } return (

{character.name}

{character.status}-{character.species}

Last known location:

{character?.location?.name}

Created:

{character.created}

Locations

Episodes

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ character: state.main.character, isFetching: state.main.isFetching }) export const CharacterPageContainer = connect(mapStateToProps, {requestCharacter})(CharacterPage)
